entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is introduced as the one who is speaking to Harry. She is described as perching herself precariously upon an upturned bucket and pushing Harry down onto a cardbo ard box ("Come along, dear — that’s right — lovely," said Rita Skeeter again...).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who is being spoken to by Rita Skeeter. He is described as being pushed down onto a cardbo ard box ("Come along, dear — that’s right — lovely," said Rita Skeeter again...).

entities.name: crocodile-skin handbag
entities.description: Rita Skeeter's crocodile-skin handbag is introduced as the one from which she pulls out a handful of candles ("She unsnapped her crocodile-skin handbag and pulled out a handful of candles...".)

entities.name: candles
entities.description: Rita Skeeter pulls out a handful of candles from her crocodile-skin handbag ("She unsnapped her crocodile-skin handbag and pulled out a handful of candles...".)

entities.name: quick-quotes quill
entities.description: Rita Skeeter mentions using a Quick-Quotes Quill to leave her free to talk to Harry normally ("You won’t mind, Harry, if I use a Quick-Quotes Quill? It leaves me free to talk to you normally. . . .").

entities.name: parc hment
entities.description: Rita Skeeter pulls out a roll of parc hment from her crocodile-skin handbag ("She reached again into her crocodile bag and drew out a long acid-green quill and a roll of parc hment...".)

entities.name: crate
entities.description: Rita Skeeter stretches the parc hment between them on a crate ("She stretched out the parc hment between them on a crate of Mrs.  Skower’s All-Purpose Magical Mess Remover...".)

entities.name: mrs. skower's all-purpose magical mess remover
entities.description: A crate of Mrs.  Skower’s All-Purpose Magical Mess Remover is mentioned as the one on which Rita Skeeter stretches the parc hment ("She stretched out the parc hment between them on a crate of Mrs.  Skower’s All-Purpose Magical Mess Remover...".)

entities.name: wands
entities.description: Rita Skeeter uses her wand to light the candles ("She lit with a wave of her wand and magicked into midair...".)

entities.name: gold teeth
entities.description: Harry counts three gold teeth on Rita Skeeter's smile ("Rita Skeeter’s smile widened. Harry counted thre e gold teeth.").

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter speaks to Harry ("Come along, dear — that’s right — lovely," said Rita Skeeter again...).
Rita Skeeter mentions using a Quick-Quotes Quill ("You won’t mind, Harry, if I use a Quick-Quotes Quill? It leaves me free to talk to you normally. . . .").
Rita Skeeter pulls out candles from her crocodile-skin handbag ("She unsnapped her crocodile-skin handbag and pulled out a handful of candles...".)
Rita Skeeter pulls out parc hment from her crocodile-skin handbag ("She reached again into her crocodile bag and drew out a long acid-green quill and a roll of parc hment...".)
Rita Skeeter stretches the parc hment between them on a crate ("She stretched out the parc hment between them on a crate of Mrs.  Skower’s All-Purpose Magical Mess Remover...".)
Rita Skeeter uses her wand to light the candles ("She lit with a wave of her wand and magicked into midair...".)
Harry counts three gold teeth on Rita Skeeter's smile ("Rita Skeeter’s smile widened. Harry counted thre e gold teeth.").
